channel.title: Pink screen instead of game starting
channel.description: #### What happened? The game is stuck at a pink screen instead of the main menu. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The game was supposed to start. #### Steps to reproduce: Open Throne of Lies. Configure settings to anything. "Play!" #### Comments: I have DirectX11 and graphics card handles most new games.

item.title: Pink screen instead of game starting
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
If you upload the output log (or better yet put in the bugs channel of the discord as it’s found sooner there) a dev may be able to find something else that’s causing it, I’m not sure why it would say you’ve only got DirectX 9.

Read full topic
item.source: Pink screen instead of game starting

item.title: Pink screen instead of game starting
item.dc:creator: Set
item.description:
Hold on, sorry. You can go ahead and close this if you want. Microsoft website says every Windows 7 install comes with DirectX 11, and Windows 7 is the OS I have. It was wrong though. Logs say I only have DirectX 9.

Edit: Logs are wrong, I have DirectX 11… Why is it using Dx9?

Read full topic

item.title: Pink screen instead of game starting
item.dc:creator: Set
item.description:
What happened?

The game is stuck at a pink screen instead of the main menu.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The game was supposed to start.

Steps to reproduce:

Open Throne of Lies.
Configure settings to anything.
“Play!”

Comments:

I have DirectX11 and graphics card handles most new games.

Read full topic
